member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_OUTPUT_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Describes a video decoder output view.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_OUTPUT_VIEW_DESC.DecodeProfile
member.summary: The decoding profile. To get the list of profiles supported by the device, call the method.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_OUTPUT_VIEW_DESC.ViewDimension
member.summary: The resource type of the view, specified as a member of the enumeration.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_OUTPUT_VIEW_DESC.Texture2D
member.summary: A structure that identifies the texture resource for the output view.
